Kural_Info.Tamil_Text: துணைநலம் ஆக்கம் த்ருஉம் வினைநலம் வேண்டிய எல்லாந் தரும்.
Kural_Info.English_Meaning: The efficacy of support will yield (only) wealth; (but) the efficacy of action will yield all that is desired.

Layered_Composition.Foreground: A split composition. On the left, a person is being helped by a powerful ally ('துணைநலம்'). This help results in a single, large pile of gold coins (Wealth - 'ஆக்கம்').
Layered_Composition.Midground: On the right, a person is acting with perfect purity and excellence on their own ('வினைநலம்'). Their action causes a magical tree to grow, and on its branches are not just gold, but all desired things—love, wisdom, health, peace, represented by glowing symbols.
Layered_Composition.Background: The image clearly shows that while good allies bring wealth, a good action itself brings everything one could possibly desire ('வேண்டிய எல்லாம்').

Art_Direction.Subject_and_Action: Good allies can bring you wealth, but purity and excellence in your own actions can bring you everything you desire.
Art_Direction.Symbolic_Motifs: The pile of gold represents the limited outcome of relying on others. The magical tree with diverse fruits represents the unlimited outcome of one's own pure actions.
Art_Direction.Lighting_and_Color: The left side has a simple, golden light from the coins. The right side is illuminated by the magical, multi-colored glow of the diverse fruits on the tree of pure action.

Technical_Cues.Camera: A balanced, side-by-side shot to compare the two outcomes.
Technical_Cues.Resolution: 8K, with magical realism effects for the tree.
Technical_Cues.Lighting: Contrasting light sources to show the difference in the quality of the rewards.

Cultural_Anchors: Good Allies bring Wealth ('துணைநலம் ஆக்கம் தரும்')
Good Actions bring Everything ('வினைநலம் வேண்டிய எல்லாம் தரும்')
The supremacy of self-action over external support.
